mapper.sql: t.id as id, t.uuid as uuid, t.server_id as serverId, t.download_url as downloadUrl, t.size as size, t.md5_hash as md5Hash, t.sha1_hash as sha1Hash, t.file_name as fileName, t.file_type as fileType, t.parent_id as parentId, t.description as description, t.tags as tags, t.valid_status as validStatus, t.created as created, t.updated as updated
